dmca.title: [ABUSE] Jagex Ltd - Copyright Infringement
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Friday, January 07, 2005 6:49 PM
To: Ian Hulme
Cc: Copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Re: [ABUSE] Jagex Ltd - Copyright Infringement

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1


Your email is being forwarded to copyright@theplanet.com for review.

- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/

IH> To whom it may concern,

IH> I hereby certify under penalty of perjury that I am the owner or am
IH> authorised to act on behalf of the owner of the intellectual property
IH> rights. I have a good faith belief that the use of the material
IH> identified below has not been authorized by the owner, its agents or the
IH> law. Please promptly remove the infringing material or disable access to
IH> it.

IH> Name of the Intellectual Property Owner: Jagex Limited
IH> Name and/or Description of the Infringed Work or Right: Various artwork
IH> belonging to Jagex Ltd as shown on our website, http://www.runescape.com
IH> aswell as several references to the RuneScape name, copyright of Jagex
IH> Ltd. 2002

IH> Description of the Infringing Material: Various images including the
IH> RuneScape logo and screenshots from the RuneScape game. These images can
IH> be found on our website at http://www.runescape.com

IH> Location of the Infringing Material:

IH> http://runescape.english.at

IH> Redirecting to

IH> http://dareko.failai.com/runescape_files/

IH> On the site is several pictures that refer to our website. I have
IH> concerns about this website because it is advertising purchasing items
IH> from our game, which this website doesn't actually own.

IH> I would appreciate someone looking at this site for me, and a possible
IH> reply.

IH> Date: 07th January 2005

IH> I can be contacted at:

IH> Name: Ian Hulme
IH> Title: Customer Support Team member
IH> Company: Jagex Limited
IH> Street Address: St Johns Innovation Centre
IH> City: Cambridge
IH> State: England
IH> Zip: CB4 0WS


IH> Email: ian.hulme@jagex.com
IH> Email: copyright@jagex.com

IH> I certify under penalty of perjury the truth of the above information.

IH> Regards,

IH> Ian Hulme
IH> Jagex Ltd.
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)

iD8DBQFB3y4TvK/XpJs6oyURAo/ZAJ4x0e0t76um4g9nLmJl6IRA0YFoFQCeLKM+
MvEG3j1prMN3h/qHftyMeIw=
=lY7A
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
